name: Game Over Moscow!
description:
You play a group of Russian soldiers who are returning from a traumatic war. The casualties have been massive and you end up trying to take over the entire Kreml. The only obstacle is the Evil League of Puticcian Oligarchs who are lurking inside the fancy looking buildings. You must search and destroy them.

There are 4 different types of units at your disposal: Military Drones, MIG-29, Artillery and a Footman Assassins equipped with a pistol and a set of Novichok. The enemy is trying to mirror the location of your hideout, which must be kept secret.

Game has two levels. The first encounter is at St. Petersburg and the second at Moscow.
